reviews.review: Como o primeiro jogo, clássico, sem comentários.

화면이랑 마우스가 고정이되서 q로마우스를 못 갖다대고 제스처를 표현을할수없습니다 그래서 멀티도 못하는고있는 상황인데요

clairement le meilleur jeu d'enigmes/puzzle l'histoire est geniale. Le mode coop avec un ami est super d'autant plus que la communauté a crée des centaines de map geniales !
很好玩！单人线的剧情特别赞！以及现实中的非洲人即使在游戏里猜拳也会一直输。

Игра требует мозгов(немного, но требует). Большое наслаждение получаешь, когда проходишь трудные уровни или играешь с друзьями(да, здесь есть кооператив). Покупка полностью оправдана и лично я ни разу не пожалел, что купил её. Всем рекомендую к покупке!
is good yes, good game made me feel happy. very good
Игра просто супер, эта игра меня очень сильно зацепила, и если у вас появятся лишнее 50 руб во время скидок то обязательно ее возьмите, точно не пожалеете)

Очень хорошая игра.

Озвучка и звуки в целом: отлично (10/10)

Portal Simulator: Part 2.
Introduces a handful of new concepts and approaches to storytelling.
Extremely polished and tested experience. Definitely recommended!

Inmersión, introspección; baladas de Kipling mezcladas con Lovecraft en un mundo de Orwell.
Futurista, el mejor de la década en cuanto a contenido empírico. Si te van los puzzles y el mundo a capas, este es tu juego.
画质和游戏方式都没得讲

[h1]Reseña sin spoilers de Portal 2:[/h1]
Este juego nos trae a Aperture Science de nuevo para experimentar de nuevo en las cámaras de prueba, Portal 2 se podría considerar una total mejora con respecto a lo que fue el primero, cámaras más desafiantes, una mejor historia, un modo cooperativo de dos jugadores, etc. Posee la duración exacta para no aburrir y dejarte con ganas de un Portal 3.
不错的游戏，能够两个人合作过关。值得入手
Fuck this fucking game it is so shit. Why is this the highest rating game on steam. This is horrible. jk lol!

Da non amante dei puzzle game l'ho trovato comunque molto interessante, ottimi gli enigmi, divertente da soli e anche in co-op, relativamente longevo (8-10 ore di gioco).
Pietra miliare della storia videoludica, da non perdere.
Great puzzle game for both single player and cooperatively.

Fun, Challenging gameplay, Amazing, engaging story, funny but also emotional as well. It's a classic and if you haven't played it I recommend you do. It stands the test of time, nearly a decade after release.

Posted: April 17, 2011

The highest rated game on Steam, the best puzzle game ever fathomed, the 2nd best game ever created, and #1 worst dev moderation in history. 

A game with limitless potential, with a limited ability to reach it.

A game with so much nostalgia, that it's players become forever stuck in 2011.

A game with such good comedy, that people mistake it for a sitcom instead of a puzzle game.

A puzzle game whose players don't like solving puzzles.

A game full of paradoxes (literally).

A game full of sarcasm. ;)

Really and truly, there is no other game like Portal 2 in existence, because there has never been another game that comes close to Portal 2's sheer amount of wasted potential. If only Valve would add a level editor and workshop, people would be able to play free, high quality puzzles indefinitely and never have to buy another game in their life. With the community in charge of creating content, there would be THOUSANDS of new maps for people to play and test their brains with every week! If I were to make predictions, this level editor should contain:

1. All Portal 2 test elements (including reflection gel and sendificators).

2. All the extra, Valve-made fizzler variants (not used in the main campaign for some odd reason).

3. All test elements from Portal 1, including cube deflectors, flux fields, positron orbs, and lifeform sensors.

4. The ability to choose between Portal 2's aesthetic styles (maybe even Portal 1), with matching element variants.

5. The ability to add custom background music from either game (I especially love "Halted Production" and "Sin").

6. An easy, resizable grid system for more complex and puzzle-relevant architecture.

7. An efficient brush compiler with optimized entity instances.

8. The ability to add custom music and screenshots.

9. Other cool and unique options for different test elements.

It's amazing how VALVe came up with all these cool new ideas; thank you so much for all your work! We can't wait to participate in all the future mapping competitions you'll hold! As for workshop integration, the only problem I foresee is people posting unsolvable puzzles on it. But if they just add a mechanic like Mario Maker where you have to beat your own level before publishing it, that should fix the issue. Oh wait, you say Mario Maker won't be released until 2015, and I just violated our NDA (no dissenters allowed) contract? Welp, guess I better change my identity and make a new account. See you in court, mate.
very good game yes I like many hours played CO-OP fun
Hilarious dialog, fun puzzles that even I can figure out (I suck at video games, especially puzzles), and great mechanics! Would recommend!
Great coop and singleplayer game, 10/10. I recommend it to everyone! :)

What is there to add that had not already been said?  Funny, clever and beautiful game; PORTAL2 is a near perfect game.  Highest recommendation!

Really good puzzle game that makes you think a lot
Really strong story

Lets be honest: I'm writing this for steam points.
Absolutely phenomenal co-op mode. Would recommend to anybody.

Quick & easy: a classic masterpiece. An improvement over the already amazing first Portal game. Co-op mode ads variety and the online player-created test chambers are incredible.
Why am I even posting a review after this game is already known for being among the greatest? Guess i just have 2 free minutes to show appreciation

I cannot get enough of this game. 10/10 for lemon grenades

UNO DE LOS MEJORES JUEGOS QUE E PROBADO EN MI VIDA AUNQUE SE ME IZO UN POCO CORTO PERO DIVERTIDO Y ESO ES LO QUE BUSCO EN ESTE TIPO DE JUEGOS LA DIVERSION Y TAN BIEN PUZZLES LO SUFICIENTEMENTE DIFICILES COMO PARA QUE ME PASE HORAS PENSANDO COMO RESOLVERLOS

Bueno sin lugar a dudas. Con una dificultad que va casi continuamente subiendo, sin llegar a ser demasiado exigente y complejo. Perfecto entretenimiento para las masas.

Muy aconsejable si tu animal favorito es el borrego y te excitan las eyaculaciones cerebrales que te ocurren cuando descubres que el resultado de 1+1 de hecho es 3 como pensabas despues de tu cuarto intento.

Solo me costó 14 horas en completarlo.

Soy el mejor en este juego, no pierdas tiempo en retarme.

Prueba de ello es mi logro:    - Mi gozo en un foso -
